name: rod
content:
rod noun [C]
(POLE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a long, thin pole made of wood or metal: He was given a fishing rod for his birthday. The concrete is strengthened with steel rods.

rod noun [C]
(IN EYE)
anatomy
  specialized a type of cell in the retina (= part at the back of the eye) that helps you to see when there is not much light Compare
cone noun (IN EYE) Idiom
make a rod for your own back
